entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
